UniprotID	Q6IMI4-2

EntryName	ST6B1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Sulfotransferase 6B1 (ST6B1) (Thyroxine sulfotransferase) (EC 2.8.2.n2)
GeneName	SULT6B1
Length	199
Function	Sulfotransferase that utilizes 3'-phospho-5'-adenylyl sulfate (PAPS) as sulfonate donor to catalyze the sulfate conjugation of thyroxine. Involved in the metabolism of thyroxine (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytosol
